Module.Content:
<script src="{{server}}/js/util.js"></script>
    <script type="text/javascript">
    function onStateCallback() {
//      wrappy.io.updateForm(form, formData);
    }
    function init() {
      if (wave && wave.isInWaveContainer()) {
        wave.setStateCallback(onStateCallback);
        wrappy.io.waveEnableForm(document.getElementById('admin_form'));
      }
    }
    gadgets.util.registerOnLoadHandler(init);
    </script>
    {% include "_admin_form.html" %}
